vsezved 0.1.0

vsezved

The goal of vsezved is to provide easy access to the Czech school registry and contact database provided by the state at https://data.msmt.cz/ and https://uiv.cz/, respectively.

It will also provide vignettes documenting the data.

Full documentation is at petrbouchal.xyz/vsezved.

Intro blogpost in Czech is at petrbouchal.xyz/cz/post/vsezved

Installation

It is not currently on CRAN.

You can install the current version of vsezved from Github with:

remotes::install_github("petrbouchal/vsezved")

Credits

Data sources

Not affiliated with the Czech Ministry of Education or the Education Information Authority who publish the data. Their people however deserve credit for getting the data out there.

Name and logo

Všezvěd is a pilgrim’s guide in a book by the well known Czech educationalist Comenius called Labyrinth of the World and Paradise of the Heart. The image in the logo comes from his other book, Orbis Pictus (complete online version), and depicts a school…
